message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of image auto-annotation, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves selecting relevant tags for each image, which is a task related to information retrieval (cs.IR). The method also involves optimizing thresholds for selecting tags, which is a task related to machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions participation in a benchmark evaluation, which is a task related to multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper proposes a method that can be used as a plug-in to boost the performance of existing systems, which is a task related to natural language processing (cs.CL).
